attributes.action: Release information on the chemical make up of the aerosol spraying by aircraft over the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like an investigation into the nature of and reasons for the almost relentless cloud creation over the UK and rest of our world.This cloud is formed when fast moving high altitude aircraft leave long lasting trails which many percieve as condensation. These trails are systematic and form a dense cover. Please investigate and provide us with evidence that this phenomena is benign.
